item.description: That Bitbucket pipelines has pipeline-specific SSH keys available at the path $BITBUCKET_SSH_KEY_FILE. See https://support.atlassian.com/bitbucket-cloud/docs/variables-and-secrets/ Also, git rev-parse --show-git-dir yields a relative path to the .git dir for that repo.
